document.masterDocTitle: Wyeomyia shannoni Lane & Cerqueira, 1942, a taxonomic puzzle (Diptera: Culicidae): synonymy, genus transfer, homonymy, and description of a new species of Sabethes Robineau-Desvoidy, 1827

subSubSection.paragraph:
With the new species described below, the subgenus
Peytonulus
now includes 13 species and two junior synonyms. The species are distributed across Central and South America ( Harbach 2021 ).
